description:
Simple cross platform two-factor authentication app.

Authme is a two-factor authentication app, you can import from QR codes or Google Authenticator QR codes.
Authme 5.3.1
- 2024.10.08. (Release update)
Improvement

- Fix 2FAS Invalid URL #318 (@SakulFlee)
